column1: It places the patient choice agenda in the context of consumerist society and argues that the complex nature of psychoanalytic psychotherapy leaves it more vulnerable than other psychological therapy modalities to compete in the current reality of consumerled public mental_health, which, in turn reflects a profoundly changed social context from that to which psychoanalysis traces its roots.
